title: Aviator HD Watch Face
summary: Aviator Skymaster Pilot  watch face for Moto 360, LG G Watch R & others
description: Model NumberDW-A14CategoryMilitaryProduct description Aviator Watch Face is a gladiatorial watch face for all smart watches, an active pushy design makes it a superb gadget (It has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and Sony Smart watch 3).it is available for all kind of watches including round and rectangle. it has customization feature which allows you to change watch face needle style (Tick or Smooth).it has following features•	Ambient Mode•	Collection of Default Ambient Modes•	Smooth Style Needle•	Tick Style Needle•	Dual Analog Display•	Date•	Month•	Square & Round Watches Support•	Night ModeAnd it doesn't end yet, follow the new customization options, features and updates, don't forget to make a comment and please kindly leave your feedback and suggestions!(Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu)Keep an eye out for our others watch face creations that are coming out soon!Follow Us on Twitter !  http://www.twitter.com/droiipd Like Us on Facebook !  http://www.facebook.com/droiipdFollow Us on Instagram !  https://www.instagram.com/droiipdFollow Us on Google Plus ! https://plus.google.com/104043898612133973188It has following featuresFeatures: ✔ Ambient Mode✔ Collection of Default Ambient Modes✔ Smooth Style Needle✔ Tick Style Needle✔ Dual Analog Display✔ Date✔ Month✔ Square & Round Watches Support ✔ Night ModeConfiguration:  ✔ switch  between Tick & smooth needle style ✔pick your favorite ambient mode For Email support Contact us at  droiipd@gmail.comTip 1Now we support 280x280 and 320x320 square watchesTip 2✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after re-sync, try these steps:1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)2. Uninstall the watch face3. Restart watch and connect device again4. Then finally install the watch faceTo install:1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Aviator Watch Face as your watch faceNotePlease, rate us positive if you like our watch faces! Don't give a bad rating too soon. If you experienced a problem, please, send us an email and we will be happy to answer it and fix an issue soon as possible.Compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Sony smart watches... (Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu)And that is not the end of it watch for the new customization options and features coming soon, and we'd love to hear from you what you would like to see on it!
descriptionHTML:
Model Number
DW-A14

Category
Military

Product description

Aviator Watch Face is a gladiatorial watch face for all smart watches, an active pushy design makes it a superb gadget (It has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and Sony Smart watch 3).it is available for all kind of watches including round and rectangle. it has customization feature which allows you to change watch face needle style (Tick or Smooth).it has following features

• Ambient Mode
• Collection of Default Ambient Modes
• Smooth Style Needle
• Tick Style Needle
• Dual Analog Display
• Date
• Month
• Square & Round Watches Support
• Night Mode


And it doesn't end yet, follow the new customization options, features and updates,
don't forget to make a comment and please kindly leave your feedback and suggestions!
(Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu)


Keep an eye out for our others watch face creations that are coming out soon!
Follow Us on Twitter ! http://www.twitter.com/droiipd
Like Us on Facebook ! http://www.facebook.com/droiipd
Follow Us on Instagram ! https://www.instagram.com/droiipd
Follow Us on Google Plus ! https://plus.google.com/104043898612133973188
It has following features

Features:
✔ Ambient Mode
✔ Collection of Default Ambient Modes
✔ Smooth Style Needle
✔ Tick Style Needle
✔ Dual Analog Display
✔ Date
✔ Month
✔ Square & Round Watches Support
✔ Night Mode


Configuration:
✔ switch between Tick & smooth needle style
✔pick your favorite ambient mode


For Email support Contact us at droiipd@gmail.com

Tip 1
Now we support 280x280 and 320x320 square watches
Tip 2
✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after re-sync, try these steps:
1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)
2. Uninstall the watch face
3. Restart watch and connect device again
4. Then finally install the watch face
To install:
1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.
2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Aviator Watch Face as your watch face
Note

Please, rate us positive if you like our watch faces! Don't give a bad rating too soon. If you experienced a problem, please, send us an email and we will be happy to answer it and fix an issue soon as possible.
Compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Sony smart watches...

(Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu)

And that is not the end of it watch for the new customization options and features coming soon, and we'd love to hear from you what you would like to see on it!
comments: Beware this app will bombard you with ads even though you pay for their product! They also trick you into wasting your return window! Pay $2 for a watch face only to realize that it's app is bombarding my phone with ads. And they cleverly enough tell you to wait up to 15 minutes for the watch face to appear on your watch which is what Google Play Store return window is for apps. After about 10 minutes the watch face still did not appear after disconnecting and reconnecting my watch multiple times and restarting my phone so I've decided to not take a chance and refund the app. I just had to come here and warn everyone
No option to change the time it takes to go into ambient mode
Very beautiful indeed!!! Thank you so much!!!

A decent face for your androidwear There has been shebangs with this developer and their previous updates. They listened and fixed what needed a fix. Now, this is one decent face for your watch should you need a beautiful look.
Ambient mode is far too bright. I love this face but the ambient mode drains my battery very fast. On my Huawei watch I see a day of life rather than 2 and a half.
Love it Really good looking watch face. Elegant, and work beautifully!
